entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EF Core 6] EFCore.SqlServer uses EOL version of Microsoft.Data.SqlClient #32395
  • Contains to OPENJSON translation regresses performance #32394
  • SqlServerDateOnlyMemberTranslator referencing DateTime instead of DateOnly #32392
  • Issues when using EF with tables that have PK Identity(int.MinValue, 1) with MS SQL #32391
  • Lazy loader throwing invalid operation exceptions #32390
  • [EF Core 8] InvalidCastException when adding Entity with nullable PK: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Func`3[System.Nullable`1[System.Int32],System.Nullable`1[System.Int32],System.Boolean]' to type 'System.Func`3[System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean]'. #32387
  • .Net8 PostgreSql scaffold T4 Template problem #32385
  • .NET 8 migration on .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid App causes exception: The type initializer for "<Module>" threw an exception. #32384
  • [EF Core 8] [Breaking Change] - error on working with explicit many-to-many relations with OnDelete.Restrict #32383

Closed

  • EFC 8.0: Precompiled model: Error CS0041 Unexpected error writing debug information -- 'Insufficient memory to continue the execution of the program.'  #32321
  • `ExecuteUpdate` doesn't work on JSON columns? #32367
  • ToJson() not working for entity with a Property named Id #32360
  • HasKey(p => new { p.Id, p.ComplexType.Property }) does not seem to work #32350
  • 'The property is configured as an EF8 primitive collection. Primitive collections in a Cosmos model are discovered by convention #32307
  • Timestamp doesn't work when the property value is updated in code #32270
  • Cancelled token does not prevent execution of ExecuteDeleteAsync(token) #31448
    7.0.16

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle shadow navigations when loading with split queries #32396
  • Correctly parse JSON from string #32393
  • Stop keeping a reference to the model in LazyLoader instances and the Castle interceptor #32388

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32379
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Test new sqlite3mc SQLitePCLRaw bundle #32369
